posts.title: Miniature Programmed Robot
posts.content: Get the kids interested in programming and robotics from a young age by teaching them the fundamentals using this miniature programmed robot. This affordable and educational toy offers loads of fun and is simple enough for any beginner to use.

posts.title: Water Roulette Game
posts.content: Try your odds against your friends in the nerve-wrecking water roulette game. After placing the special hat on, players take turns flicking the spinner, and then proceed to remove one or more of the rods on top of the hat and pray they don’t get drenched.

posts.title: Locking Wine Bottle Stopper
posts.content: Keep your favorite wines fresh long after you open them up by sealing them afterwards using these locking wine bottle stoppers. They feature an easy to use two step locking mechanism to provide an air-tight seal to ensure freshness and prevent spills.

posts.title: BBQ Thermocouple Thermometer
posts.content: Ensure you never under or overcook a slab of meat again by grilling it to perfection with help from this BBQ thermocouple thermometer. It features a compact waterproof body and provides a temperature reading with an accuracy of ±0.9° in just 2 to 3 seconds.

posts.title: Floating Cocktail Table
posts.content: Stop getting out of the pool every time you want a drink – now you can keep them nearby on this floating cocktail table! Made from a durable stain and fade resistant fabric, this fluffy table comes with 4 cup holders and a convenient built-in bucket holder.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Indoor Basketball Hoop
posts.content: Enjoy an exciting game of hoops day or night using the glow in the dark indoor basketball hoop. This luminescent setup comes decked out with a spring action break-away glow in the dark rim complemented by equally radiant backboard graphics.

posts.title: Star Wars Darth Vader Apron
posts.content: Channel the power of the Dark Side to protect yourself against grease stains by putting on this Darth Vader apron. This one size fits most cotton apron comes designed like Vader’s iconic suit and is machine washable so you can always keep it looking like new.

posts.title: Six Person Towable Tube
posts.content: Turn a regular day at the watering hole into an unforgettable experience as you travel at break-neck speeds along the water’s surface on the six person towable tube. The elongated design allows up to six people to partake in an adrenaline pumping ride.

posts.title: Hockey Puck Bottle Opener
posts.content: Combine your two greatest passions into one compact and enabling package with the hockey puck bottle opener. With a maple leaf emblazoned on one side and bottle opener on the other, it’s the most Canadian way possible to pop open a maple lager.

posts.title: Magnetic Wristband
posts.content: Avoid dropping screws, bolts, and nails during your next home improvement project by strapping on the magnetic wristband. It attaches to either your wrist or belt buckle and features a small magnetic surface that keeps all metallic parts close at hand.

posts.title: Hand Crank Portable Espresso Machine
posts.content: Enjoy top quality caffeinated beverages even if you’re away from your kitchen by using this hand crank portable espresso machine. You simply move the lever in a seesaw-like motion to pump the water and build up pressure to prepare a delicious espresso.

posts.title: Glowing USB Wall Charger
posts.content: Avoid misplacing your electronic devices in the dark by plugging them in with this glowing USB wall charger. With a total 2 amp output, this compact dual-sided charger features an embedded light that emits a cool colored glow when plugged in.
